data.text: @LupeColon @Progenabiome @Venturatrials @US_FDA It’s all about the gut and specifically your 💩

@SabinehazanMD @Progenabiome @Venturatrials @US_FDA What about COVID and GERD? Upper GI issues? 
I took Ivermectin for LC and it not only stopped my 8-month LC diarrhea but it changed my lifelong IBS-C. However, I’m now concerned about the upper GI…..
Thank you for your amazing work. 
I live in SoCal and I want to see you…
@SabinehazanMD @Progenabiome @Venturatrials @US_FDA Congratulations and Thank You Dr Hazan !
@SabinehazanMD @Progenabiome @Venturatrials @US_FDA Would transient numbness in limbs, abnormal cycle cramping, and heart flutters 9 weeks post infection  be long Covid?
@SabinehazanMD @ParadiseLostCA @Progenabiome @Venturatrials @US_FDA If you can share, what is the incidence of long covid in patients you treated for Covid?

@SabinehazanMD @Progenabiome @Venturatrials @US_FDA @SabinehazanMD, Spouse had CV in Jan 2020, also sick in Dec 2021 and is suffering from lingering symptoms. Are you seeing, testing and treating local patients for LongCOVID?
@SabinehazanMD Janiesays Yay! I remember! old account locked.
